Bleeding: Target takes [5% Attack Power] physical damage for each hex they move. Reduces Physical Resistance by 4% for each stack. Can stack up to 10 times.
Poisoned: Target takes [10% Spell Power] shadow damage each turn. Reduces healing received by 1% for each stack. Can stack up to 100 times.
Crippled: Reduces Movement Points by 1 per stack.
Stealth: Invisible. Attacking from Stealth has 100% critical hit chance.
Blind: Skill range is reduced to 1 hex.
Marked Prey: Damage taken increased by 10% per stack.
Salvation: Restores [~100% Spell Power] health per turn.
Chilled: Movement points reduced by one per stack. Lasts 2 turns. Five stacks of Chilled freezes the target.
Shocked: Incoming critical strike damage increased by 10% per stack. Lasts 3 turns. Can stack up to 10 times.
Heat: Elemental resistance reduced by 5% per stack. Lasts 3 turns. Can stack up to 10 times.
Exhaustion: Cannot receive additional action points. Caused by receiving addition action points this turn.
Life Steal: Life Steal heals you for a percentage of your Max Health each time you hit. Reduced for area of effect and no AP cost abilities.
Sleep: Cannot move or perform actions and damage taken increased by 50%. Can be awakened by getting attacked.
